snippet: Ahmad Hellat says his message — approved by clerics once suspicious of him — is all about love, positive thinking and prosperity.
abstract: Tehran Journal; motivational speaker Ahmad Hellat has found enormous success and legions of followers in Iran, where clerics who once opposed him have now given him their blessing; nation's prolonged economic struggle and unusually high incidence of depression have created environment in which Hellat's message of positive thinking and prosperity has thrived.
lead_paragraph: Ahmad Hellat says his message — approved by clerics once suspicious of him — is all about love, positive thinking and prosperity.

headline.main: Motivational Speaker Finds Eager Audiences in a Struggling Iran
headline.print_headline: Motivational Speaker Finds Eager Audiences in a Struggling Iran
